sub_topic: Show that every group of order 96 is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C96, the alternating group A4 × C4 × C2, or one of the 196 non-abelian groups of order 96.
message_1: How many non-abelian groups of order 96 are there and can you name at least three non-isomorphic non-abelian groups of order 96?
message_2:
There are 15 non-abelian groups of order 96. Here are three non-isomorphic non-abelian groups of order 96:

1. The semidirect product of Z_32 and Z_3, denoted as Z_32 ⋊ Z_3, where Z_n represents the cyclic group of order n. In this group, the action of Z_3 on Z_32 is non-trivial.

2. The semidirect product of Z_16 and Z_6, denoted as Z_16 ⋊ Z_6. In this group, the action of Z_6 on Z_16 is non-trivial.

3. The semidirect product of Z_8 and Z_4 × Z_3, denoted as Z_8 ⋊ (Z_4 × Z_3). In this group, the action of Z_4 × Z_3 on Z_8 is non-trivial.

These groups are non-isomorphic because they have different structures and properties.
